sentences.sContent: And some farming systems, such as traditional pastoralist systems, are frequently under-represented, say the authors.
sentences.sContent_eng: And some farming systems, such as traditional pastoralist systems, are frequently under-represented, say the authors.
sentences.sCn: 这组作者说，而且一些农业系统——诸如传统的畜牧系统——常常未被充分代表。
